Package org.drip.analytics.output

Class CompositePeriodAccrualMetrics

java.lang.Object
org.drip.analytics.output.CompositePeriodCouponMetrics
org.drip.analytics.output.CompositePeriodAccrualMetrics
public class CompositePeriodAccrualMetrics
extends CompositePeriodCouponMetrics
CompositePeriodAccrualMetrics holds the results of the compounded Composed period Accrual Metrics Estimate Output.

  • Module = Product Core Module
  • Library = Fixed Income Analytics
  • Project = Date, Cash Flow, and Cash Flow Period Measure Generation Utilities
  • Package = Period Product Targeted Valuation Measures
